entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Englee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 a.m. NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Englee 1:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Temperature: 3.2°C
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1 except plus 5 south of Hare Bay. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1 except plus 5 south of Hare Bay. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Windy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
